name: @timoaus/define-claude-code-hooks
description: Type-safe hook definitions for Claude Code

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:patch: npm version prepatch --preid=alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:minor: npm version preminor --preid=alpha && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:alpha:major: npm version premajor --preid=alpha && git push && git push --tags
